input_text:
Job Title: Site Safety Manager

Location: Plain City, OH

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
If you are the type of individual who enjoys making a lasting difference in the lives of others, Cardinal Compliance Consultants is the place to be. Cardinal Compliance Consultants prides itself on being a leader in the health and safety consulting community providing cutting-edge solutions to our client's health and safety needs.
Our client needs an individual for a vertical build project in Iron Mountain, MI that will last 30 to 60 days. Approximately 30 to 60 hours per week, Monday through Friday, with a strong possibility of overtime.
Responsibilities:
- Oversee and manage all aspects of the construction site safety, ensuring compliance with NEC, OSHA, and other relevant regulations- Develop and implement safety programs and procedures to maintain a safe work environment- Coordinate with contractors, subcontractors, and suppliers to ensure timely completion of projects- Monitor project safety goals- Manage construction safety documentation- Conduct regular site safety inspections to identify potential hazards and address any issues promptly- Collaborate with project stakeholders to resolve any conflicts or disputes that may arise- Provide leadership and guidance to site staff, including training and development opportunities- Maintain effective communication with clients, providing regular updates on project safety status
Qualifications:
- OSHA 30-Hour Construction Card or OSHA 500, OSHA 502, or OSHA 510 training within the last 5 years required.- Proven experience in construction safety management- Familiarity with EHS standards and occupational health practices- Excellent organizational and time management skills- Strong problem-solving abilities and attention to detail- Effective communication and interpersonal skills to collaborate with various stakeholders- Ability to work well under pressure and meet deadlines
If you are a highly motivated individual with a passion for construction and a commitment to safety, we encourage you to apply for the position of Construction Site Safety Manager. We offer competitive compensation packages and opportunities for career growth within our organization. Join our team today!
This is an immediate hire set to start right away.
Job Types: Full-time, Contract
Pay: $40.00 - $50.00 per hour
Expected hours: 30 – 60 per week

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: Site Safety Manager
output_json.summary: Cardinal Compliance Consultants is seeking a Site Safety Manager for a vertical build project in Iron Mountain, MI.
soft_skills: Excellent organizational and time management skills
Ability to work well under pressure and meet deadlines

Ensure compliance with NEC, OSHA, and other relevant regulations
Develop and implement safety programs and procedures
Coordinate with contractors, subcontractors, and suppliers
Provide leadership and guidance to site staff
